fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Tox has the ability to make someone vanish into the shadows. Select a player, ally or enemy.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Targeting a Fox will make them Astral and immune to visits tonight. Targeting the same Fox again will only give them Astral.
- Targeting a non-Fox will make them vanish. Their ability will fail tonight and they cannot vote or speak the next day.
